column4: the desktop is either behind this blue one or its being shut down on boot
sudo apt-get -y purge ubuntu-desktop ; sudo apt-get install ubuntu-desktop
It reverts or brings up a different desktop with a blue background and only one folder on it
First my original desktop comes up and then this other one with a bluebackground
when did it start doing it? what was done before it started happening?
i haven't done anything at all AFAIK
i just installed ubuntu yesterday, i ran the main update after install
when you did an update did you also activate any display drivers?
i didn't run into anything like that
